DOC.brief_title: Concussion Testing : A Novel Non-invasive Concussion Detection Device
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study establish non-invasive objective measurement detection concussion Jan Medical Device ( JMD ) . The study assess ability device demonstrate unique signal correlate concussion . The study also test athlete baseline rest exertion determine difference signal exertion alone . The JMD non-invasive band place around participant head . The JMD detect unique pattern signal base displacement skull change blood flow individual heartbeat . The athlete test longitudinally assess change time , addition change impact
